The vnrighteovs Mammon exchanged for the true riches or A sermon, preached at the funeral of William Adams Esq; in the parish church of St. Lawrence Iury on Tuesday. Septemb. 3. 1661. By Thomas Horton. D.D. Horton, Thomas, d. 1673.
[8], 36, [4] p.
printed by I.R. for John CLark, and are to be sold at the entrance into Mercers Chappel, London : 1661.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
